attributes.action: The Home Office to urgently publish data on illegal migrant crime.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to see the truth at a national and neighbourhood level regarding the enormous negative impact on our society and our people, particularly on women and girls, from the crimes committed by illegal migrants.
The Home Office refuse to provide this data, stating that the public doesn't want to see it nor have questions asked in Parliament regarding it. We need to challenge that incorrect assertion and we need to see the truth. You need to see the shocking truth.
attributes.background: The British public demand clear, accurate, transparent and regular crime data from mass immigration and particularly illegal immigration. Publish this data publicly and also support our MPs when they directly request such from you. We want to see the true big picture and the details for ourselves.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Collect and Publish statistics on crimes committed by illegal immigrants
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709094
